data.title: index: la grammaire de l'absurde
data.meta_description: Tex's French Grammar is the integral grammar component of Français Interactif, an online French course from the University of Texas at Austin.  Français Interactif includes authentic, spoken French language via digital audio and video clips, a French grammar reference (Tex's French Grammar), self-correcting French grammar exercises, vocabulary and phonetics sections, Internet-based activities, comparative cultural polling, and an electronic workbook.
